explains: n. 冗长而枯燥的陈述；连祷

sentences.en: She remained in the doorway, listening to his litany of complaints against her client.
sentences.cn: 她停留在门口，听他喋喋不休地抱怨她的客户。

sentences.en: Chemistry isn't a litany of facts.
sentences.cn: 并不是仅仅枯燥的事实的罗列。

sentences.en: Let me just demonstrate the litany of pie. Okay, page 15.
sentences.cn: 让我来展示一下这冗长的派，看第15页。
